1.0.0.name: connect20/HD_MultiCurrencyTransactions
1.0.0.description: Allows Magento to use the user-chosen display currency as the actual transaction currency.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
